name: openstack-ops-database
description: Provides the shared database configuration for OpenStack

recipes.client: Installs client packages for the database used by the deployment.
recipes.server: Installs and configures server packages for the database used by the deployment.
recipes.mysql-server: Installs and configures MySQL server packages.
recipes.mariadb-server: Installs and configures MariaDB server packages.
recipes.mariadb-cluster-server: Installs and configures MariaDB Cluster server packages.
recipes.openstack-db: Creates necessary tables, users, and grants for OpenStack.
